title: One-pot chicken and tomato pasta
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cubed', '2 cloves garlic, chopped or to taste', '125ml red wine', '2 (400g) tins Italian-style chopped tomatoes', '225g dried pasta', '150g fresh spinach, chopped', '125g Mozzarella cheese, grated']
